::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
He hesitated. He didn't like the idea of anyone harmin=
g his wife but the cold calculating side of his reprogrammed mind came thro=
ugh.
=A0
Rodimus: Reprogram her. Bolster our forces. We need it. Use and se=
crets we may learn to our advantage.

eaches the 'Ready Room' and makes it inside. He was very 
careful while mov=
ing through the ship. He knew he was being hunted.

> Rodimus starts t=
o go through the office. He wondered what Perceptor 
wanted to find. As he =
went through files and the computer he learned 
that several commanderess h=
and come and gone on this ship and later 
base. Then came the information h=
e would inevitably find. One 
document, a duty roster from many years ago, =
read: Commanding Officer 
Rodimus Prime. 
> =A0
> A name so like his? Dark =
Rodimus clicks on the link that takes him 
to a profile on 'Rodimus Prime.'=
 For several minutes he reads quietly 
as he learns the entire history of t=
his Autobot. A single thought 
crosses his mind: is he and this Autobot one=
 and the same? The file 
mentions a family. A Maximal wife named Nightlight=
 and a daughter 
named Elita. The name Nightlight seemed so familiar.
> =A0=

> Dark Rodimus leans back in the chair and swivels around in thought. 
A p=
hotograph then catches his optics. The family! He sees this 
Rodimus Prime.=
 He looks just like him except with a different color 
scheme. The daughter=
 and... Nightlight! The femme that Perceptor is 
holding!
> =A0
> What does=
 it all mean?!
> =A0
> Rodimus reopens his commlink with Perceptor.
> =A0
>=
 Rodimus: Perceptor... You knew what=A0I would find here. Why have me 
know=
 these things? Tell me everything. And... and tell me what you 
plan to do =
with my...wife?

arching

netrating the darkness emptiness of the ship. Their audio sensors 
> captur=

ahead

motion

r

ourge could see the form of 
Rodimus

g, also on his way towards the

as

 `painted' Rodimus' back . . .
